name: Gaming tournaments
description: Immerse yourself in thrilling gaming competitions at our convention! We provide a top-notch environment for tournaments
information: Immerse yourself in thrilling gaming competitions at our convention! We provide a top-notch environment for tournaments

name: Expo hall
description: Step into the heart of gaming innovation! Our Expo Hall is a gamer's paradise, featuring the latest games, cutting-edge hardware, and engaging demos

name: Cosplay contest
description: Unleash your inner hero! Join our cosplay contest and become your favorite gaming character. Show off your creativity, craftsmanship, and passion for gaming

name: Merchandise Vendor
description: Dive into a treasure trove of gaming merchandise! Our convention hosts a vibrant marketplace where you can discover exclusive clothing, accessories, collectibles, and artwork inspired by your favorite games

name: Streaming zone
description: Level up your content creation game! In our dedicated streaming zone, you can connect with fellow creators and engage with your audience in real-time

name: Food and bevarage services
description: Satisfy your gaming appetite with us! We understand that gaming can work up an appetite, so we provide a variety of food and beverage options right at the convention
